query:
UPDATE users
            SET
                email = CASE
                    WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN COALESCE($1, email)
                    ELSE email
                END,
                password_hash = CASE
                    WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN COALESCE($2, password_hash)
                    ELSE password_hash
                END,
                edited_at = CASE
                    WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN now()
                    ELSE edited_at
                END
            WHERE id = $3
            RETURNING *
